title: How to Make Siri Say Your Name + Fix Pronunciation

steps.title: Ask Siri, "What's my name?"
steps.content: Ask Siri, "What's my name?" Depending on your Siri settings, you may need to say "Hey Siri" or press and hold the side button first. Siri will respond with your name. There's currently no way to make Siri call you by name without specifically asking or commanding Siri. In the past, Siri may have responded with "Yes, [name]" but this feature is not available.

steps.title: Open the Contacts app.
steps.content: Open the Contacts app. This looks like a book with colored tabs on the right side. If you don't already have Siri set up , do so now.

steps.title: Tap My Card.
steps.content: Tap My Card . You can find this at the very top. It'll be next to your current name and profile photo. If you don't see this, tap + in the top-right corner and enter your information. Tap and hold the new contact in the list and select Make this My Card . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This is in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Enter a new name.
steps.content: Enter a new name. Delete the current name in the field and enter a new one.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . This will save the new name.

steps.title: Open the Contacts app.
steps.content: Open the Contacts app. If Siri is mispronouncing your name or a contact's name incorrectly, you can change the pronunciation.

steps.title: Tap the contact that you want to fix the pronunciation for.
steps.content: Tap the contact that you want to fix the pronunciation for. This can be anyone in your contacts list, including yourself.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This will allow you to change the contact's details.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap add field.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap add field . This will allow you to select a new field to add to the contact.

steps.title: Tap Phonetic First Name.
steps.content: Tap Phonetic First Name . You can use this to change the pronunciation of the contact's first name. You can also select "Phonetic Middle Name" or "Phonetic Last Name" if you need to change the pronunciation for either of these.

steps.title: Type the phonetic spelling for the name.
steps.content: Type the phonetic spelling for the name. Use a spelling that will make Siri pronounce it correctly. For example, you might spell "Margot" as "Margoh."

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . This will save your changes.
